website_summaries.verdict: Consider this compact, low-priced model for very small areas and low to moderate humidity; otherwise it may not meet your dehumidifying needs.
pros: Compact model that does a good job in limited spaces such as guest bathrooms, RVs, and small bedrooms
Inexpensive price and energy efficient to operate
cons: Doesn't work well in spacious areas
Some reports of units that turned out to be "lemons

website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for small spaces where humidity is high: bathrooms, laundry rooms, garages, RVs.
pros: Peltier technology condenses water vapor without a noisy compressor

customer_reviews.title: Buy a "real one"
customer_reviews.text: I use a 70 pint dehumidifier in the house and tried it in the walk in closet. it showed significant amount of moisture. I then placed this new small unit in the closet and turned it on. After 6 hours no moisture accumulated. Knowing that there is a significant amount of moisture in the air but this unit is not collecting any demonstrates that in my mind you are better with a unit with a compressor even with a smaller water collector. The cost of this unit is such that you, in my opinion, you are better with a "real unit".
customer_reviews.author: Otter

customer_reviews.title: Light duty use only!
customer_reviews.text: Used to keep RV trailer dry during winter. Stopped working last week about 11 months after I received. Definitely a light duty product not suited to long term use. Buy with care and consider the multi year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery C. Ottesen

customer_reviews.title: I love my mini dehumidifiers
customer_reviews.text: I love my mini dehumidifiers! Bought two of these almost a year ago for my mobile home. I live in a super humid climate and everything wants to mold in my house if it rains the moisture % gets so high. I can't say enough about how happy I am with these little machines! Love the small size for my small space and they put out no hot air which is fantastic! Super portable, quieter than most and they hardly take up any space. I recommend these to everyone!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mjhuscusson

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage. I can't believe that this many people have ...
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. I can't believe that this many people have given this thing a 4 star rating. Seems very fishy. It has sat in a room that is between 50-60% RH for 4 days, and the reservoir has yet to fill past a centimeter. What is this thing even doing?
customer_reviews.author: Not Me

customer_reviews.title: After 24 hours, my humidity went up, not down!
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom humidity is always in the upper 60s. When I received this dehumidifier I had high hopes. But after running the unit for 24+ hours, there was only about a 1/4' of water in the collection cup. And my humidity level went up from 66 to 70. I kept the bathroom door closed the entire time, the rest of my home was fine at 55. Plugging in and running a small electric space heater for 30 minutes brought the humidity level down from 70 to 55. I purchased this on positive reviews. But for me this unit just doesn't work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Beware the “CE” logo
customer_reviews.text: Works decent but I’m concerned about the electronicals inside. It is NOT UL listed. It only has the dreaded “CE” ( Chinese Export) logo on it which usually means the electronic components inside are either crap or, worse, dangerous to be plugging into your socket. I definitely would use this device in a GFI socket only and search for a YouTube video of the components inside to see just how dangerous it might be.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Alonzo De Colon y Galaraga

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect this product to last more than one year
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. Bought 3 units that have run a collective total of 4 years. NO more. There is no good reason for a fan, a switch, a simple control board, a regulated power supply, and a solid state peltier device (if adequately attached to a heatsink) to keep dying after about a year. They charge way too much for the product quality they are shipping, and they know it. Probably a big part of the reason they charge so much is their warranty return rate is so high.
customer_reviews.author: R. O.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my closet always gets musty and I have to pull EVERYTHING out and rewash 3 times a year. I sealed and repainted the closet, and put most of my clothes in garment bags to help keep the mustiness at bay, but it kept coming back. Finally bought this little beauty and it fills up about once a week (how does that much water collect in a closet that has an open door??) and has kept the musties away. My clothes now smell like clothes instead of something a yeti dragged in. It is smaller than I expected but works like a machine twice its size.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Nevermind

customer_reviews.title: Small but efficient. Really pulls the water out of my RV!
customer_reviews.text: After opening the box. I was weary of my purchase. Don't let the size fool you. This little guy sucks all the humidity out of my 22' toy hauler. Must empty daily. But works excellent. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Will E.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I purchased this item for my bedroom because it was very damp and we were noticing mold accumulating around door way and behind where the head of our bead touches the wall, after a ton of research and days of looking at pages of dehumidifier’s I decided on this one. We are pleasantly surprised at how well it functions and how quiet it is!!! We have it on while we are sleeping And you Would never know it was on. So far I’ve had it on for 3 days and it has accumulated about half a tank of water. I recommend this product for any small rooms with excess moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Dani A

customer_reviews.title: Conflicted
customer_reviews.text: I use Damprid bags in closets , bathroom and other areas but thought I would give this a try. I ordered 3. The first one came and would not turn on at all. Returned it. Second one came and works so far and in 1 day it is already 1/4 full. Third one is en route so TBD. So if you get one that operates, it seems to work. But seems unacceptable for a product to ship and not even turn on (tried different outlets, etc..it was the product, probably a faulty adapter)
customer_reviews.author: pearlsandpigskins

customer_reviews.title: For you boondockers out there..... ...
customer_reviews.text: For you boondockers out there ...... Using the optional DC cigarette lighter cord this unit uses 2.8 amps. I was hoping it would draw less amperage since I am planning on running it off of my batteries this winter. Also, it seems it's moisture claims are based on a fairly warm temperature....somewhere around 80F. I am guessing it is more efficient in warmer temps. Which my travel trailer will not be this winter. I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Eats_Three_Meals_A_Day

customer_reviews.title: Worked almost exactly 1 year to the day.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item September of 2018 and it worked fine for 10 months. By August of 2019 I was having to jiggle the water container to get it to stay on and today, 9/14/2019 it won't even turn on. It is officially D E A D. The product ought to last longer than a year. We were using it in the camper so it was not heavy use or abuse. Stored in the box when not in use. Will replace with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase, I recently moved to a new house that doesn't have a vent in one of the bathrooms and just opening a window wasn't doing enough to clear out the steam. I was a little hesitant about buying a dehumidifier because I'd never used one before but it does the job perfectly, it takes up very little space and the slight hum it makes when running faded into the background almost immediately
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lipken

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: East to use and turn on off and discard the water. My only issue is that it doesn't seem to be picking up that much water in my closet. I am on the ground floor of a condo building in New England and there has been damage to clothing because of humidity and mildew. Likely that I also have damp rid in closet and I got humidifier when weather started getting cold and there was less humidity. I hope it starts attracting more water in Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from humidity.
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully. I ordered it, not expecting much since it's small, but needing a dehumidifier because of a hot water leak causing a build up of humidity in my apartment. I was surprised by how well this works. Within an hour of plugging it in I noticed a difference in the air and after just one night the tank was half full of water! Now that my leak is fixed I'll be keeping it for the bathroom to cut down on steam. It runs very quiet and so far I have nothing negative to report. It also was packaged very well and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well!
customer_reviews.text: We keep these in our bathrooms to help keep the house humidity down. They seem to work very well. When the humidty is low, will take days for the reservoir to fill up, but when the humidty is high, reservoir fills up much more quickly. This tells me it's working the way it should. My only negative is it does seem to produce more heat than I would like, this makes me question the energy efficiency as well. not able to adjust for humidity %, it's only on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job extracting water from the air in our RV
customer_reviews.text: Silent. Effective. Does a great job extracting water from the air in our RV. We were a family of four staying more than a week in a 5th wheel with daily showers and running washer /dryer constantly. This little guy did a great job keeping up with us. Was initially worried it might be too small but it really worked well for us. Might buy a couple more for our house as well. We had it plugged in in the bedroom/ bathroom area and never heard it. Amazing performance for something this quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product with matched Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great! Small and quite, perfect for our RV. It purrs away day and night 24/7 for us. However the fan on the unit started to make some noise about a year after purchase. This was just after the manufacturers warranty expired and of course I didn’t register it. I called the manufacturer expecting to hear a sorry, but was shocked at how accommodating they were. They sent me a replacement unit at no charge. Customer Service isn’t dead with this company!!! Wonderful folks and I recommend any of their products!!! Bravo!!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Ceretto

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in humid environments
customer_reviews.text: After having a large dehumidifier in my bedroom I became an advocate for using dehumidifiers since it worked so well. I was excited to find this small dehumidifier on Amazon and I wanted to use it in my small bathroom since all the reviews seemed very positive. I used this small dehumidifier for a month in the bathroom, but it doesn’t help decrease the humidity at all. It will take a week to fill up the tiny reservoir, which isn’t much. You will be better off buying a better dehumidifier with a compressor than can collect a gallon of water in a couple hours. This product does not work well for humid environments and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good For A Small Space.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sleeping in a basement bedroom at a relative's home. During the summer I noticed it gets damp and musty. Bought this mini dehumidifier not expecting much. I was surprised at how well this works in my small space of approximately 100 sq. ft. Very easy to use, virtually soundless, and a breeze to empty, which I do each morning. It sucked a good amount of moisture from the air. Definitely not for a large space but economical and hardworking for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean; stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little dehumidifier. It worked very well to clear the humidity out of my bathroom after showers, etc. However, eventually I noticed that there was some black mold growing inside the plastic container at the bottom that the water dripped down into. But, there was no way to open up the container and clean it! has anyone found a way to clean this out? I even poured Listerine in there and left it for a few days hoping it would kill the mold. It didn't. Not too long after that, the motor got louder and louder and I just unplugged the thing and threw it out. I am disappointed because it did perform very well for months.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen H.

customer_reviews.title: Small and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for our small bathroom. Our bathroom has poor ventilation and our towels were not drying at all. This dehumidifier is small and quiet. I've had to empty it twice so far (I've only had it for a week). It has been filling up approximately every 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Truong

customer_reviews.title: Pulls the water out of the air
customer_reviews.text: This little unit really pulls the water out of the air. It is quiet and low power consumption, which is exactly what I was looking to find. I'm using this in our camper van and moisture buildup is now a thing of the past! I definitely recommend the Eva-Dry-1100 and would buy it again if the need arises. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mini dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mini dehumidifier. I bought this to use in our 5th wheel camper (we are full timers - living in it with my husband, 16 yr old son and Bob the Cat) This little gem has kept the condensation off our windows! Towels and shower are drying now, too. I just move the small unit into the bathroom after morning showers.) Easy to dump water (I use it to water my few indoor plants) I fully recommend this Eva-dry unit.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, but Go Bigger
customer_reviews.text: This really works great, but I would go with a bigger size if your area is evenly slightly decent. I have it setup in a 3x3 area and it keeps humidity down by probably 10%, but a larger one is really needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Got one then another
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but then I said what do I have to lose? My hallway bathroom has no windows but it does have an exhaust fan in the ceiling. I started developing mold right next to the bathtub. I got rid of the mold but I said let me try a dehumidifier in there to see if it helps. It's only my 3rd day but the water than gets in trap is crazy. And now I know when people say that their bath mat is dry because mines is the same way. Long story short, this one I purchased worked well so I decided to get one for the master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: This won't pull quite as much as described but it usually is full after three days. We live in an RV in Florida where humidity and mold are out of control and so we had to figure out something. We've been running this constantly for a couple months and it does knock down the humidity enough that the water is not running down the walls which is helping significantly cut down on mold issues. Our travel trailer is 23' long and if you were in something any larger you should look into two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Works well in a small bathroom, quiet and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Product does a great job reducing the moisture in my small bathroom. This is the third unit I have purchased as each of the previous ones ran continually for a couple of years. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: environ2

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. At all.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this unit plugged in and turned on for three days straight and there is not a single drop of water in the tank. Not less than I was expecting, it is totally dry. It was in the unfinished storage portion of our basement. I've used other units that consistently pulled moisture out of the air, so its not that its just a super dry room. Not sure what the issue is with this unit, but back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: shalb

customer_reviews.title: Eva-dry petite
customer_reviews.text: This little trooper has been running faithfully non stop for nearly 5 years. Don't expect it to dry out your bathroom while your taking a shower, but smaller storage rooms it does the trick. Holds my room at roughly 35-40% humidity. Room is maybe 10x6. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 5th Wheel!
customer_reviews.text: Living full time in our 40 ft 5th Wheel along the coast in Texas is very HUMID. Having this little dehumidifier in our home for < 3 hours proved itself by filling up half way; we were shocked! Easy to use, extremely quiet. Not sure about the energy efficiency as we knew this was a must with how humid is where we live. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Good little dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dehumidifier. I have a laundry room adjacent to a bathroom. Maybe about 120 square feet altogether. This does a good job. It fills up in 3-4 days, 2 cups of water. Easy to empty. No mold this year and it’s been a very wet summer here in Western North Carolina. It’s very quiet. Just a soft small fan noise. Cheap to operate. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MRW

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This new unit has run for 4 days in an uninsulated humid bathroom in New Orleans and has only collected 3/4 inch in trap. Don't waste your money unless you live in a fairly dry climate. Money lost on this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews on this product but took a chance. I wanted something small for my bathroom as there is no other ventilation. The product worked great for about 1.5-2 weeks. I would mostly run it for a couple of hours at a time in the morning after showering. One morning I went to turn it on and it was completely dead. I tried unplugging everything, I tried using different outlets in different rooms of my house, nothing worked. I ended up returning it. It was disappointing because it did work really well for me up until it died.
customer_reviews.author: E.Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for small damp bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: It works great for its size. I was satisfied with using it in a small bathroom. I Had a problem with excess moisture in bathroom. The tank was full of water the following morning. I was pretty surprised. With out circulation or ventilation Excess moisture in your home or enviroment can lead to mold and rot and trouble breathing. If your dealing with a small area that is always damp consider trying this out. It was perfect use for me. Fan is very quite I keep it running 24/7 no problems.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best little humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little humidifier!! I just love it and am constantly amazed at how much moisture it pulls out of my closet. I empty it every other day. I live in Florida and humidity is just a normal way of life, but this little guy makes a big difference in how my closet feels and smells. I'll probably buy a few more to put all around. So glad I found this, I was buying those damp rid things and this is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Loli Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathroom with no exhaust fan!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is a workhorse! Solves the problem of having no exhaust vent. We have it in a small bathroom. No more musty smells or mildew! The only reason I give 4 stars is because it quit working after about 9 months of continuous use. However, the Eva-dry company sent me a replacement very quickly! Excellent customer service. Eva-dry gets 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Raines

customer_reviews.title: Small, wasted money.
customer_reviews.text: We have a big Frigidaire dehumidifier that we use in the living room and thought a smaller one in the bedroom would be a good idea. Unfortunately, we either have a faulty one (doubt it) or the device is just too small to work properly. Feels more like a toy than a dehumidifier. We are buying another big Frigidaire for the room.
customer_reviews.author: PDG

customer_reviews.title: These are really great but if you have high humidity
customer_reviews.text: These are really great but if you have high humidity, then get the next size up (Eva-Dry Edv-2200 Powerful Electric Mid-Size Dehumidifier). I was dumping the water out every few days with this smaller one. So I moved one into a bathroom and one into my small den. The kitchen and back room by the door were just too wet for this small size. They work like crazy though. I love the silky feel of the air by them.
customer_reviews.author: GemTree

customer_reviews.title: which I love. When mold began to appear on my other ...
customer_reviews.text: Summer in Boston can be humid. I had an Eva-dry rechargeable small hanging dehumidifier for one of my bathrooms, which I love. When mold began to appear on my other bathrooms, I decided to give this petite dehumidifier a try. I received it two days ago and it has been working to suck the moisture out of the said bathroom. It is very quiet, and has gathered almost half a container of water. I will update in a few months to see if it's working effectively against the mold.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Minero

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This little fella works hard, but is very quiet and energy efficient! I have it running in my bedroom almost all the time, due to my house getting very humid. This unit by itself can't completely overcome the humidity, but it does keep it from getting out of hand, and will even lower it a little if I am not home. I have a larger unit that I run from time to time, but the electricity use on that one is extremely noticeable, so the Edv-1100 is a much more economical choice for day-to-day climate control.
customer_reviews.author: Tristikov

customer_reviews.title: Makes the room more comfortable in GA summer
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with a dehumidifier and it's been a good experience. This is quiet, compact, and I think it's effective. It's fun to watch how much water it can remove from the air in a day. I think I'll buy another to put in the other bedroom and get a higher powered one for the large common space. This is effective for a relatively smaller space. :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Upon using this in our 200sq ft RV to help with condensation it has not helped at all. I read reviews prior to purchase that were used in a larger RV or space and they have this item good reviews now I question the validity of those reviews. Of you purchase this item be sure out is for a very small space such as a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Giacomozzi

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Quite.
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our RV bedroom closet. I keep doors open for air. We never hear it running even in quite of night. Works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Perano

customer_reviews.title: Great closet dehumidifer
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product some time ago and it made a believer out of me. Our closet is off of bath shower and we have had humidity problems. This product works well and pulls humidity and collects in self container with water level cut off. It takes 5-7 days, before filling and I have to empty. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Small, quiet, and easy to empty!
customer_reviews.text: I own a mini camper that is 6 ft x 8 ft and this mini humidifier is perfect!! We were experiencing moisture build up on the walls while we were sleeping inside. After purchasing it we took it on a trip in which it there was 100% humility outside plugged it in and watched our weather gauge go from 100% to 45% in a few hours. It is also extremely quiet!! I would recommend it to anyone that was having a moisture problem in a small space!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good for very small space
customer_reviews.text: No obvious filter and very hard to clean lint that will accumulate inside. This could be a potential issue because most people won't even think about that. It's very small and is good for very small space
customer_reviews.author: M'Belle

customer_reviews.title: Good little unit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little unit I use in the (30’) motor home every winter. This is my second one, as the first only lasted 2-3 yrs. it’s much better at pulling moisture out than the static units that don’t have fans. I like the others suggestion to put a (hillbilly) drain in the reservoir, since it pulls so much moisture it requires u to empty it every so often. I’m hoping this one will last longer. One more thing, I’d avoid using it in temps less than 35 as it will freeze up and makes a mess of the fragile components.
customer_reviews.author: B. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great, for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a closet during rainy days, every 3 days the tray would get full of water, so it did work, and made me realize I had to fix the humidity in that closet too. It does make a bit of noise but I had a door so I would not hear it at night unless I walked in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Updated: no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Update: it worked great for about 2 years, then completely stopped collecting moisture. Old Review: So far, our Eva-Dry has been running continuously in a small closet since we received it. It is getting a lot of moisture out of the air-- has to be emptied every two to three days. However, the humidity in our closet is still high.... I can't imagine that we'd need a larger dehumidifier for the size space. It is very quiet and is doing it's job. It's a little smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work very well.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this little unit but.... after turning it on and letting it run for three days in a camper at 65-70% humidity it only made about an Inch of water. I should have had to empty it at least once a day. Upon farther review I saw a bunch of this unit with different names all over amazon....buyer beware of Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: J-FED

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: This little dehumidifier is very good. It replaced a larger one we had in our motorhome. The only thing I really don't like is the lid on the collection container does not come off. You drain the water out of a hole in the top. The larger dehumidifier lid came off completely so I could clean and bleach it. Other wise we like it. It is compact and does the job in our 37 ft Motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: William L Sperow

customer_reviews.title: Collects a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: So far this seems to be working great. Runs quietly and pulls a lot of moisture out of the air. Bought it for a small master bathroom that has no fan - it is a ground level bathroom with a window, but since it is winter and I shower at night I have no desire to open the window to let steam out. I turn this on at the start of my shower and let it run until morning. I've lived in apartments without great ventilation before and the mildew that eventually grew was gross. Hoping to avoid that with this little unit.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Dehumidifies as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've now gotten 2 of these. One for a garage room, and the other for the bathroom. Small, relatively cheap, and works exceedingly well and seems to be quite durable for the fact I have left the one in the garage running 24/7 for a year before the fan started to die. Better yet, the fans in these things are PC Case fans. Its quite easy to replace them, though hard to find a similar Amp equivalent on the cheap. My Garage room dehumidifier now runs on a slightly slower fan, but is absolutely soundless now where the default fan moves a little more air but makes a soft hum.
customer_reviews.author: WOLead

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in the laundry room where I hang some wet clothing. It seems to work great since I have to empty it twice a week. The first unit I got lasted about 6 months before the fan bearing went bad making a loud rattling sound. I would have taken away 2 stars for that but I contacted their customer service who was friendly on the phone. Without question they offered to send me a new unit as long as I sent the defective one back. The experience with their customer service was quick and painless, so they earned 2 stars back.
customer_reviews.author: HybridHB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help keep my bedroom feeling cooler at night because I don’t have A/C. I was shocked at how much water it sucked out of the air. It works great and made a big difference!
customer_reviews.author: P. Tavis

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This little fellow works really well. It very quickly pulls moisture out of the air. We probably dump the water every couple of days. It has a 2 cup capacity. The sound is a nice white noise in the background. We liked this little guy so much we bought its bigger brother, which also works great. I am not sure about the electricity usage, though.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great little product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a little over a month now. During the humid summer season, the tank probably filled up once every two/three days. I was surprised it was able to pull so much water from the air. It urns off by itself when full. No complaints thus far, and it's not very loud - I never notice it and my desk is pretty much 5/6 feet from my bathroom. I use it in an extremely small bathroom within a studio apartment so it works for my purposes. It would probably work well in a medium sized walk-in closet as well. Great for the price and for those who don't need an industrial sized dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: KL C

customer_reviews.title: Great for our RV
customer_reviews.text: We live in our 5th wheel & I got this for the bedroom. Works really well, It's quiet. We have to empty it every 4 days maybe, when it's really hot/humid. It runs constantly because we live in a damp area. The auto shut off is a nice feature when the reservoir is full. We need additional units because of our humidity levels and where we live, so we'll be purchasing the same brand but bigger soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with it. But I was also sent a second one. I got charged ok. I think it was because I changed my payment method. I’m sure it was me who did the mistake. I’m keeping them both cuz they both are smaller than the one I’m replacing.
customer_reviews.author: ooie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier stopped working after 5 months, I am very disappointed. The yellow light indicator stays on stating it is full, there is not water in it. I took good care of this product however it did not last very long. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wynette Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the walk-in closet mold/odor free
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping the walk-in closet mold/odor free. My walk in closet is in the same room as the bathroom separated by a door....The closet tends to fill up with humidity every time someone takes a shower and I had feared that it would cause mold/odor causing bacteria to form in the closet. this definitely prevents that from happening when used in conjunction to a very nicely fragranced Damprid..
customer_reviews.author: J.C088

customer_reviews.title: This little thing really works well! It was quite ...
customer_reviews.text: This little thing really works well! It was quite a bit smaller than I expected (the size of a toaster, if stood on end) but it really works to get the moisture out. I was looking for something smaller than a $200 full-size dehumidifier for my small downstairs. This works well, no complaints, but I wish I had gotten something a little bigger. There doesn't seem to be an in-between.
customer_reviews.author: SgtMamma

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my 38 foot sailboat. They work well. Pull enough water from the air to prevent condensation when the temperature suddenly drops. No more 'rain' in the boat, and even all the cushions are dry. They use little power, and neither the dehumidifier nor the power pack get more than slightly warm. The bucket holds enough for a week in the winter in the south. The automatic shut off works well, so no spill overs occur. The only thing I would improve would be to add an outlet from the bucket to drain into a sink when desired. In summary, this is an excellent product for dehumidifying small areas.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Page

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dehumidifier to use in a basement "closet" that house sump pump is located in. The small room gets extremely humid because of the water basin and the room being closed off. This small dehumidifier is the perfect solution. My only issue with the dehumidifier is that there is no way to automatically empty the water reservoir through a house. To fix this I added 1/2" to 3/4" (garden house) adapter tap to the bucket. Now the dehumidifier drains into the sump pump water reservoir, eliminating the need to ever empty the tank (or have the dehumidifier auto shut off).
customer_reviews.author: tickko

customer_reviews.title: Great little dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: I live on a houseboat. A houseboat that has wooden walls. I use a lot of dehumidifiers. This particular one is in my bathroom and is a little trooper. It fills up with water maybe once a week and I just use the water to water plants, or just dump it. I have zero complaints, I bought this months ago and it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnita

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dehumidifier in March 2015. It has been great at keeping our bathroom dry. The other day it would not turn on. I was disappointed it stopped working after a year and a half because I paid $50+. I didn't register the warranty but decided to contact Eva Dry for repair recommendations. I was pleasantly surprised when one of the company representatives called me and offered a new power adapter for free to see if it fixed the problem. Sure enough I plugged in the new adapter and it works again. I love great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for very small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a closet or under cabinet. I had well water lines coming into the house under a cabinet so lots of condensation when cold water hit the indoor heat. Kept everything dry so no mold. Good for small or medium sized closet too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Tallberg

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it has a simple on off ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a curing chamber for dry curing whole muscle meats (Braseola, Lonzino, etc.), it was just the right size for the tall dorm fridge and pulled moisture out of the meat without creating too much heat. I like the fact that it has a simple on off switch instead of a soft touch digital button because I used it behind a controller that senses humidity and turns the de-humidifier on and off accordingly by killing the power to it and then turning it back on when needed. If the switch is digital it won't come back on when needed until you push the button.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Low

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This little dehumidifier is a beast! I've had mine running every day for... oh... 8 months? It really helps to keep the steam down in my small, unventilated bathroom. I'm also always surprised to see how much moisture it collects when I leave the apartment for days at a time (i.e. the shower isn't running every day for 20 minutes). I especially appreciate the way it shuts off when it reaches capacity. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: LindsayRoseEliz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: Great performance for an small device. I bought the big size almost two years ago for my office because the room where we store the College apparel clothing was stinking muggy. It works perfectly! The room smell fresh now. I bought two small ones for my closes at home and they work to perfection. NO more muggy smell and no more mold or mildew in the leather items. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Coha92

customer_reviews.title: After 7 days of running continuously in a small, ...
customer_reviews.text: After 7 days of running continuously in a small, 7x6 foot bathroom with a shower being used every day, the machine collected only about 6 ounces of water. Don"t know under what use cases this machine would be worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if something this small could make a difference but I was surprised at the amount of moisture it was able to pull from the air. Obviously a larger, more expensive unit would do a better job at dehumidifying but this one works well enough that I'm comfortable while working at my computer. I have this dehumidifier seated on a table about 12-15 feet away from me and next to a fan so that the fan blows drier air towards me. I've only been using it for about a week so I can't comment on the durability of the product but as far as effectiveness goes, it works for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: SET2011

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for - quiet-small-energy efficient
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday for my 25 ft motor coach. It is very quiet and I can already see the water reservoir 1/4 full. This is exactly what I was looking for. Let’s hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This little thing does the trick! I live in an older home and for some reason my bed room is always so humid and stuffy. I bought this to go right on my night stand and it does a great job. I breathe and sleep happy with it. It fills up completely in 3 days (not sure if thats average for other people or not but my room is very humid). For this price you really can't complain.. I noticed people complaining that it broke after 2 years.. I leave this thing on 24/7 so if it lasts that long it deserves 10 stars. Definitely a must have for small humid spaces!
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of what you actually need
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as being able to handle more square foot than I tried . While it did work it just wasn't powerfull enough to keep the humidity in check. Small, quiet, cheaper to run, but just not big enough. Don't expect to keep a rooms humidity under control. Unless it's a very small room and very little humidity.
customer_reviews.author: The Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work a year.
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifer worked well during the summer. It would fill about once a week which was a good amount. I unplugged it for the winter and plugged it in again this spring. I worked through two cycles of filling and it will not collect water anymore. The motor works, but no water collection and I didn’t even have it a year before it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: R2D2's Lesser-Known, but Equally Hard-Working Miniature Cousin
customer_reviews.text: Beep Bloop!! Hard little worker. Dries out our tiny 7' x 6' vent-less bathroom and prevents mildew. I alternate using it with my small window, and manually dump the tray once every week or two. Relatively quiet and small footprint. My only complaint is that the electrical cord is black (no love to white bathrooms?) I resolved that by winding up the black cord and using a white extension cord, instead. Did a lot of research before buying this dude, and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rynona Wyder

customer_reviews.title: Leave the window cracked and save your money
customer_reviews.text: This got great reviews but not doing well for us . we are RV people and condensation is a problem but it's only a small area in our living room. Size is 10 x 14 with four windows three are 22x36 and the main is 24 x 60 We actually have to place the unit on the shelf right in front of the window and it still is wet around the frame and glass near the edges. We finally just closed the outside window cover as I am tired of drying the window daily. If I saved the box I would return it ASAP
customer_reviews.author: John Gobii

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This thing has dramatically cut down on the humidity level in a small, add on bathroom that had previous problems with mold. It’s so satisfying to see the bin fill up with water, and see it work!
customer_reviews.author: Roanie1012

customer_reviews.title: Worked right away
customer_reviews.text: Started working right away. I bought this for my RV but thought I would try it out at home first. Put it in the master bathroom and within an hour I could see that it had already started collecting moisture from the room. Overnight the container was about 1/3 full. Didn't even know I had that much moisture to collect. Now I know it will do a good job in the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Used in two rooms, one larger , one smaller. Did a relatively efficient job, very quiet, easy to use, no musty odor, good choice for the money
customer_reviews.author: lynda nemeth

customer_reviews.title: This mini-dehumidifier does exactly as described. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pleasure to write a review about my new little mini-dehumidifier purchased for one reason. To keep the moisture out of the interior of my vehicle parked in the garage. Living in SE N Carolina the summer air is humid and traces of mildew were discovered on the leather. This unit has solved my problem 100%. I empty the waiter tray approx every 10-14 days and I could not be more pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JCE Jr

customer_reviews.title: very efective
customer_reviews.text: i am really impressed by how much water this thing pulls out of the air. it hums along quietly in my camper trailer, and i rest easy that mold will not take over. it fills up after 3-4 days in the winter and if i forget to check on it, it shuts off automatically. Quick and easy to empty, great product at a great price. highly recommended for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: jubal byrne

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty quiet and is a "white noise" for those who ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. It is pretty quiet and is a "white noise" for those who like white noise in the background. It is "petite" so it is kind of slow but has been very helpful in decreasing humidity in my bathroom, living room, kitchen, and bedroom. It automatically stops when it gets full but that hasn't happened since it takes several days/ a week to make it full.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but some product feedback for improvement........
customer_reviews.text: These things work quite well and are very quiet. My husband uses a bipap with oxygen right next to my closet and too much moisture gets in there. I have four of these running 24/7. After a few years, one is occ making noises, so I got a back up in case it goes. The only downside is the water reservoir can be emptied thru a hole, but not taken apart. Over the years, the fans have sucked in the occ small flying creature, which die plastered against the wall of the reservoir. There is no way to clean them out.
customer_reviews.author: Island Mom

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it’s an amazing little workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to put in my bedroom after having the same unit in my living room. The one in the living room I’ve had for a couple years and works amazing! This one I bought in February 2019 and in April it died. Completely died. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BrenH

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little machine !
customer_reviews.text: I researched very extensively to make sure I found the very best one ! This one looked up to every review view and expectation! It works great and it’s pretty quite. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tailoredsuits

customer_reviews.title: this dehumidifier works great in my walk in closet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this dehumidifier it works great in my walk in closet. The only thing is I should have gotten a larger one, because I have to empty this about every 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: R Oder

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and going!...Workhorse!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little dehumidifier for some outdoors equipment I have undercover....attached a drain hose and never have to empty again. 3+years and going.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use in the bathroom of my apartment. Usually the towels wouldn't dry over night, but since having this dehumidifier it hasn't been a problem. After being turned on for only a few hours it had already pulled about a half inch of water out of the bathroom and into the container. And it is super quiet, I can't hear it at all unless I put my ear next to it. I rated it 4 stars and not 5 because the first one we ordered was broken and needed to be replaced, but even so, the return process was easy, and the replacement came in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE AND DOES THE JOB WELL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my basement. The home we rent is over 300 years old. The basement is very moist. The smell would permeate all the way upstairs. I couldn't afford to buy a large dehumidifier so I turned to Amazon, yet again. Voila! I found the Eva-dry Electric Petite Dehumidifier. I am so glad I bought this! I cannot tell you how much this little machine has changed my home. I only have to empty it every 4 days during the summer and even longer now that it is winter. I highly recommend this little jewel.
customer_reviews.author: IMMickey

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I WAS GOING TO PURCHASE A DIFFERENT DEHUMIDIFIER BUT THE REVIEWS WERE BAD. SOMEONE IN THE REVIEWS PUT THIS MODEL NUMBER AND I WENT TO LOOK IT UP AND ALL THE REVIEWS WERE GOOD. THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT. I HAVE A LOT OF DAMPNESS IN MY SUITE AND THIS WORKED PERFECT FROM THE FIRST DAY., IT TOOK OUT OVER A CUP IN THE FIRST 24 HOURS. I WAS AMAZED IT IS VERY QUIET AS DESCRIBED. FINALLY A PRODUCT THAT WORKS LIKE IT SAYS IT DOES. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TO EVERY THAT HAS A PROBLEM WITH MOLD AND DAMPNESS.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: We have a 36' travel trailer and want to keep condensation limited. The Eva-Dry has helped quite a bit, but not to the degree that there is no evidence of condensation. However, when we use electric heat more than propane heat (which produces water vapor as a by-product) the Eva-Dry keeps up much better. Currently it is collecting about a cup of water every 4-5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Chloie

customer_reviews.title: Very quite and works well
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the bathroom and it works well. Not the fastest dehumidifier but very quiet and ideal for small humid rooms. Shuts off by itself. Sometimes the plug overheats which worries me but no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Albena Gesheva

customer_reviews.title: Water collector
customer_reviews.text: Age placement adult supervision. Pros; Power does automatically shuts off when three quarters full, Just empty than replace, fun to see it doing its job function, small, Cons; just an tad of motor noise can be heard. Would been nice with none complete silence (using for bedroom instead of gun room). I score it an 10 out of 10 the least 9 only because of tad of noise or I like to see more water fill up faster (I'm wrong here). Like I said its fun too have to see it works!!!! I feel like I'm accomplishing Eco friendly or health kick movement.
customer_reviews.author: June0563

customer_reviews.title: Good mini dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: There is a certain wall in my room where mold would form. I decided to buy this to control the moisture. So far, it’s been good. It collects the moisture and it’s easy to empty the water out.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces. I am in the military and when I deployed to the Middle East, it was extremely humid. I purchased this humidifier and it worked wonders. My room wasn't so "wet" after coming in after a long day at work. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that needs to dry out small rooms/spaces. I'm in a very small space so don't use in large rooms, I'd say the average size of a small kid's room and smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fan
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on my boat for only 3 months and the fan is already starting to fail. It does a decent job of removing humidity, but how much more would it really cost to put a decent ball bearing fan in there? Edit: I replaced the fan with an 80mm ball bearing fan I found on eBay for under $10. It's much quieter and was a perfect fit. Any 80mm fan should work, but finding one with ball bearings is key for reliability.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.P.I.

product_meta.title: Eva-dry Edv-1100 Electric Petite Dehumidifier, White
product_meta.description: Eva-dry Edv-1100 Electric Petite Dehumidifier, White
feature_bullets: LESS NOISE OUTPUT - The average noise output for all of the thermo-electric dehumidifiers we tested was 53.2 dB. On the other hand, the EDV-1100 was measured at 50.9 dB, 2.3 dB below average. Making it generate less noise to provide you a good night sleep at night.

MAXIMUM PORTABILITY - The EDV-1100 couldn’t be any more portable. For one, it can easily be transported. Secondly, it is also one of the smallest, lightest thermo-electric dehumidifiers on the market.

LOW POWER CONSUMPTION - The Eva-Dry EDV-1100 has a manufacturer specified power draw of 22 watts. That makes it low on energy consumption so you can save on your electricity bill and also helps the environment. Capacity - 16 ounces

SUPERIOR QUALITY – It is made from high quality and superior materials making it durable. It also has renewable reservoir which absorbs musty odors from stagnant air and also eliminates odors and fungus.

PLUG AND PLAY SETUP - This couldn’t be easier to use. Simply plug it in and turn it on. It will immediately start dehumidifying. If the condensate collection bucket fills up the “FULL” LED will light up and the dehumidifier will automatically shut off.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars3,612 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Power Adapter, Power Cord, Eva-Dry Electric Petite Dehumidifier Edv-1100
